long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you turn on “Dark Mode Touch” , you'll see a button appear onscreen.
You can drag it to any edge of the screen, where it will stay until you move it again. 
By default, tapping the button once will active dark mode.
There are five levels of dark mode.
